Hotel.name: Crowne Plaza Los Angeles - International Airport

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Los Angeles, Crowne Plaza Los Angeles - International Airport is by the ocean and convenient to Automobile Driving Museum and Toyota Sports Center. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Promenade at Howard Hughes Parkway Center and Loyola Marymount University.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 613 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can catch a ride on the shuttle (surcharge), which operates within 3 mi.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 4 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-out. Planning an event in Los Angeles? This hotel has 14000 square feet (1301 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 4 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can catch a ride on the shuttle (surcharge), which operates within 3 mi.
Make yourself at home in one of the 613 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Located in Los Angeles, Crowne Plaza Los Angeles - International Airport is by the ocean and convenient to Automobile Driving Museum and Toyota Sports Center. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Promenade at Howard Hughes Parkway Center and Loyola Marymount University.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Automobile Driving Museum - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Toyota Sports Center - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Promenade at Howard Hughes Parkway Center - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Loyola Marymount University - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Lakes at El Segundo - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Old Town Music Hall - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Hollywood Park Racetrack - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Hollywood Park Casino - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Los Angeles Forum - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Westfield Culver City Shopping Center - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Fisherman's Village - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Polliwog Park - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Manhattan Beach Pier - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Venice Fishing Pier - 8.1 km / 5.1 mi
Sony Pictures Studios - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi

The preferred airport for Crowne Plaza Los Angeles - International Airport is Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Crowne Plaza Los Angeles - Intl Airport is Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
